children.content:
Running Arrangement
SGT1 Breaker
SGT2 Breaker
Middleble Fdr

System Voltage and Alarms (kV)
Transmission
Chapelcross
Gretna
Middleble
<canvas id="barChart" width="685" height="343" style="display: block; box-sizing: border-box; height: 301px; width: 601px;"></canvas>

ANM System Control
ANM Enable
Microgrid Enable
<canvas id="lineChart" width="685" height="343" style="display: block; box-sizing: border-box; height: 301px; width: 601px;"></canvas>

<textarea cols="195" rows="16" id="txtAreaJsonData">{
  "minRow": 1,
  "cellHeight": 10,
  "margin": 5,
  "float": true,
  "cellHeightUnit": "rem",
  "children": [
    {
      "x": 0,
      "y": 0,
      "w": 6,
      "h": 2,
      "content": "
          <table class="table table-borderless table-hover align-middle">
            <thead>
              <tr class="table-dark">
                <th colspan="3" scope="col" id="widget_2_title">
                  Running Arrangement
                </th>
              </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
              <tr>
                <td>SGT1 Breaker</td>
                <td>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="sgt1_breaker" value="Close" disabled="">
                </td>
                <td><i class="fa-solid fa-rotate"></i></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td>SGT2 Breaker</td>
                <td>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="sgt2_breaker" value="Close" disabled="">
                </td>
                <td><i class="fa-solid fa-rotate"></i></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td>Middleble Fdr</td>
                <td>
                  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="sgt1_breaker" value="Close" disabled="">
                </td>
                <td><i class="fa-solid fa-rotate"></i></td>
              </tr>
            </tbody>
          </table>
        "
    },
    {
      "x": 6,
      "y": 0,
      "w": 6,
      "h": 2,
      "content": "
          <table class="table table-borderless table-hover align-middle">
            <thead>
              <tr class="table-dark">
                <th colspan="4" scope="col" id="widget_2_title">
                  System Voltage and Alarms (kV)
                </th>
              </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
              <tr>
                <td>Transmission</td>
                <td>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="transmission" value="368.00" disabled="">
                </td>
                <td>
                  <i class="far fa-lightbulb" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" data-bs-title="Off state" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <i class="fas fa-lightbulb" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" data-bs-title="On state" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td>Chapelcross</td>
                <td>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="transmission" value="33.37" disabled="">
                </td>
                <td>
                  <i class="fas fa-lightbulb" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" data-bs-title="On state" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <i class="far fa-lightbulb" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" data-bs-title="Off state" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td>Gretna</td>
                <td>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="transmission" value="33.42" disabled="">
                </td>
                <td>
                  <i class="far fa-lightbulb" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" data-bs-title="Off state" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <i class="far fa-lightbulb" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" data-bs-title="Off state" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                </td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td>Middleble</td>
                <td>
                  <input type="number" class="form-control" id="transmission" value="33.36" disabled="">
                </td>
                <td>
                  <i class="fas fa-lightbulb" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" data-bs-title="On state" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                </td>
                <td>
                  <i class="fas fa-lightbulb" data-bs-toggle="tooltip" data-bs-title="On state" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                </td>
              </tr>
            </tbody>
          </table>
        "
    },
    {
      "x": 0,
      "y": 2,
      "w": 5,
      "h": 2,
      "content": "
          <canvas id="barChart" width="685" height="343" style="display: block; box-sizing: border-box; height: 301px; width: 601px;"></canvas>
        "
    },
    {
      "x": 5,
      "y": 2,
      "w": 2,
      "h": 2,
      "content": "
            <table class="table table-borderless table-hover align-middle">
              <thead>
                <tr class="table-dark">
                  <th colspan="2" scope="col" id="widget_1_title">
                    ANM System Control
                  </th>
                </tr>
              </thead>
              <tbody>
                <tr>
                  <td>ANM Enable</td>
                  <td>
                    <div class="form-check form-switch">
                      <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="anm_enabled" checked="">
                    </div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
                <tr>
                  <td>Microgrid Enable</td>
                  <td>
                    <div class="form-check form-switch">
                      <input class="form-check-input" type="checkbox" id="microgrid_enabled">
                    </div>
                  </td>
                </tr>
              </tbody>
            </table>
          "
    },
    {
      "x": 7,
      "y": 2,
      "w": 5,
      "h": 2,
      "content": "
          <canvas id="lineChart" width="685" height="343" style="display: block; box-sizing: border-box; height: 301px; width: 601px;"></canvas>
        "
    },
    {
      "x": 0,
      "y": 4,
      "w": 12,
      "h": 3,
      "content": "
          <textarea cols="195" rows="16" id="txtAreaJsonData">Awaiting JSON data...!</textarea>
        "
    }
  ]
}</textarea>
